### Trajectòria dels equips
```{r, echo=F,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
suppressMessages(library(tidyverse))
suppressMessages(library(plotly))
d <- suppressMessages(read_csv("~/Google Drive/Futbol/data_trajectories.csv", col_types = cols())) %>% filter(league == "tercera")
teams <- suppressMessages(read_csv("~/Google Drive/Futbol/teamlist.csv", col_types = cols())) %>% select(-fullname)
d <- d %>% left_join(teams, by = "team") %>% select(shortname, points, round)
names(d) <- c("Club", "Punts.Projectats", "Jornada")
levels <- d %>%  group_by(Club) %>% arrange(desc(Jornada)) %>% slice(1) %>% arrange(desc(Punts.Projectats))
levels <- levels$Club
d$Club <- factor(d$Club, levels = levels)
plot <- ggplot() + geom_line(data = d, aes(Jornada, Punts.Projectats, color = Club)) + theme_minimal()
plot2 <- ggplotly(plot, width=875, height=600)
plot2 <- config(plot2, displayModeBar = FALSE)
plot2
```
